review: I'm not satisfied with this product. More than one time it developed trouble with the wireless service. The result was to require identifying the wireless network, reissuing the encryption password and reestablishing the connection. On Amazon service advice I installed the short HDMI adapter which helped  but did not completely eliminate the problem.

review: I ordered this because I like to try all kinds of new tech.  I already owned an Apple TV and a Chromecast so I was skeptical of my need for another gadget of this type and figured if I wasn't wowed, I'd simply return it.  I was INCREDIBLY impressed.  So much easier to use than my Chromecast and I hardly use my AppleTV anymore.  Definitely worth $40.
